channel.title: Bos on The Little Dataset

item.title: Go East, Young Woman
item.description: We’ll always have Palo Alto1 It is 9:30pm PST on Friday evening and my seat beat is buckled. The lights are a dim purple as they always are on Virgin America flights. As if we are all headed off to a prom on the opposite side of the country together. My favorite safety video in the industry starts to play–an accumulation of visuals and beats that usually gives me a giddy feeling that only Beyonc√© videos have the power to provoke–however, in this moment, I begin to tear up despite the image of a shimmying nun displayed in front of me.
